name: Solrock
author: Kyoko Umemoto
flavor_text: It absorbs solar energy during the day. Always expressionless, it can sense what its foe is thinking.

abilities.name: Sunbeam
abilities.effect: The maximum HP of each of your Lunatone in play is 130.

attacks.name: Scorching Light
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed. If tails, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Burned.
